entries.name: The Fogbound
entries.description: A smuggler’s guild cloaked in mist. Traders of secrets, ghosts, and salt routes.

entries.name: Pact of the Crown
entries.description: An order of seers and tacticians bound to ancient observatories and oathbound tomes.

entries.name: Ember Reclaimers
entries.description: Furnace-born salvagers who recover scorched relics from the Ashfallen Age.
